description:
Narrower gauge tubular webbing for making custom-length, skinnier slings with reasonable strength. This is appropriate for climbing applications that don't require the strength of a pre-sewn sling.

  • This product is sold by the metre
  • Made of nylon
  • 16mm width
  • Strength is approximately 13kN static (1350kg)
  • Note: tying a knot in webbing reduces strength and does not meet the CE sling standard of 22kN, which is achievable with pre-sewn slings
name: Beal 16mm Nylon Tubular Webbing
